channel.title: How do I make a server?
channel.description:
Hello
I want to make my own world, it needs to be hosted by someone else though. Can someone make one for me and make me admin please? Or what ever you think is best, I really dont understand it.
Thanks very much.

item.description:

Mike Menaker can you tell me how to make the large gray box on my screen disapeer so i can actualy play.

Read full topic
